root.name: Donkey Konga 2
root.description: OverviewThe title screen for the Japanese version.Â Donkey Konga 2 is the sequel to Donkey Konga that is for the Gamecube. Known as Hit Song Parade in Japanese, the game has various songs from various artists. The only song that appeared in all three versions is called Donkey-Kong-A-Go-Go (Donkey Konga 2 Theme in the European and American versions). The game also has various minigames for you to play during the game.
